titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the high-church of Edinburgh, upon Sunday, April 27. 1690 Before many of the nobility, barons, and burrows, members of the High Court of Parliament, and the magistrats of the said city. As it was taken from the author's mouth when preached.
titleStmt.author: Meldrum, George, 1635?-1709.

titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the high-church of Edinburgh, upon Sunday, April 27. 1690 Before many of the nobility, barons, and burrows, members of the High Court of Parliament, and the magistrats of the said city. As it was taken from the author's mouth when preached.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, by order,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Edinburgh University Library (reel 1816) and the British Library (reel 1919).
Imperfect: Item at 1919:15 is cropped at head, affecting numbering; pages stained slightly affecting text.
